title: [Self-Directed] M-TBLT-Based English Speaking Proficiency Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary proficiency, familiarity with fundamental terminology in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Focused on developing immediately applicable practical English speaking skills for working professionals in workplace contexts

learning_goals: Learners can communicate clearly using 10+ complex sentence structures in real-life and workplace contexts
Learners can explain specialized terminology in medical/legal/technical fields with ≥85% accuracy
Learners can sustain continuous speech at ≥100 words per minute (pruned speech rate) for 5+ minutes
Grammatical error rates can be reduced by 40% through real-time feedback using mobile apps

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
